name: Prodigium
description:
A small horror monster-collecting game, for the Scream Jam (unfortunately I didn´t have enough time to actually include most of the horror features I had planned, so not sure, if it counts as a horror game).

Currently there are 5 different monsters ( + 2 evolutions) which you can use to defeat the first demon guard and other wild monsters.

The current version is 9 days old, so there might be a few bugs, if you encounter any please let me know.

Will update this from time to time, so feedback and critism ist highly appreciated.

Update Plan:

-More Monsters

-Better UI

-Better Background Art

If you are interested in helping this project in anyway, for example as an artist or musician, just contact me :).

Font by Cruzine (Creative Market)

Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
